ingredients.ingredient: ½ (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
1 (1.8 ounce) package dry leek soup mix

cookingTips: Mix dip at least 2 hours ahead to allow flavors to bloom
Use full-fat sour cream and mayonnaise for best texture and taste
Adjust seasoning to taste if soup mixes are very salty
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand how to balance dry soup mixes with fresh dairy to create a balanced, flavorful dip.
